content.text:
# New Features

Several new plugins and features have been added to the ElizaOS repository:

- A news plugin was added (PR #1248)
- A plugin for the Zilliqa blockchain was introduced (PR #2842)
- A Telegram client account was implemented (PR #2839)
- Access Token Management was added to the MultiversX Plugin (PR #2810)
- A Gelato plugin relay was created (PR #2799)
- Support for the APRO plugin was added (PR #2794)
- An XMTP Client was implemented (PR #2786)
- An arbitrage plugin with example character was added (PR #2784)
- Message parsing was improved (PR #2772)
- A Trikon plugin was introduced (PR #2653)
- DEVA client integration was added (PR #1238)
- Twitter media posting capability was implemented (PR #2818)

# Bug Fixes

Numerous bug fixes were implemented across various plugins and components:

- Fixed a bug in goal objectives update lookup logic (PR #2791)
- Updated BS58 version to resolve integration test dependency issues (PR #2848)
- Simplified and fixed exports in the Imgflip meme generation plugin (PR #2846)
- Fixed issues in multiple plugins including Story, SUI, Suno, Akash splash, TEE-Marlin, TEE-Verifiable-Log, ThirdWeb, TON, TTS, Twitter, Udio, Video-Generation, Zerion, and ZkSync-Era (PRs #2844, #2843, #2840, #2838, #2837, #2836, #2833, #2832, #2829, #2827, #2824, #2823, #2822, #2819)
- Ensured Farcaster client loop continues running even if an error occurs (PR #2830)
- Fixed NVIDIA NIM environment issues (PR #2817)
- Added exclusion for extra folder to improve future rebase speed (PR #2813)
- Updated cookie dependency to v0.7.0 to address security concerns (PR #2834)

# Testing Improvements

Test configurations and coverage were enhanced for several plugins:

- Added test configuration and coverage for the "Anyone" plugin (PR #2854)
- Added test configuration and coverage for the 3D generation plugin (PR #2850)
- Implemented test configuration and coverage for the 0x plugin (PR #2807)
- Added test configuration and coverage for the 0g plugin (PR #2805)

# Documentation Updates

Documentation was improved in several areas:

- Added new READMEs and moved some existing ones for consistency (PR #2828)
- Updated embedding function documentation (PR #2821)
- Updated the Telegram client README (PR #2814)
- Created a Discord client README (PR #2812)

# Other Updates

- Added BTCFun Plugin for Eliza (PR #2797)
- Updated initialization for BTCFun & Trikon plugins (PR #2643)

categories.title: Recent Issues in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub Repository

content.text: Several users have reported technical issues with the Eliza platform. User 'actuallyrizzn' reported two separate problems: one where Discord integration fails with an infinite typing loop (issue #2792), and another where the headless web interface won't connect in version 0.1.8+build-1 (issue #2795). User 'nicky-ru' identified a message ID collision in the Telegram client (issue #2796), while 'photografereth' reported a crash in the Btcfun functionality (issue #2864). Another user 'imransbaig' noted that the application won't run on Replit (issue #2803).

There are also several plugin-related issues and feature requests. Users have requested to add new plugins including 'plugin-apro' (issue #2793), 'plugin-sui' (issue #2851), and discussions around 'node-llama-cpp' (issue #2815). User 'ai16z-demirix' raised an issue about test configuration and coverage for 'plugin-asterai' (issue #2859). Additionally, user 'Resister-boy' has requested a feature to collect information from Telegram groups or Discord channels (issue #2856).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests to elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several new features and plugins have been proposed for the Eliza framework through recent pull requests. These include:

1. Access Token Management (PR #2808) by elpulpo0

2. Deribit client and plugin integration (PR #2809) by uwecerron

3. Gelato plugin relay (PR #2799) by anirudhmakhana

4. APRO plugin support (PR #2794) by fifahuihua

5. News plugin (PR #1248) by ileana-pr

6. Storyteller feature (PR #2831) by Mettulus

7. Hyperliquid plugin with WebSocket support (PR #1497) by AIFlowML

8. OKX DEX integration (PR #2865) by Julian-dev28

9. Arbitrage plugin with example character (PR #2784) by mmarfinetz

These pull requests demonstrate ongoing development to expand Eliza's capabilities, particularly in financial services, content generation, and system management.

Current cryptocurrency prices show significant fluctuations across major tokens. WETH (Wrapped Ethereum) is currently trading between $3,232.33 and $3,317.36, showing price volatility. SOL (Solana) is valued between $240.35 and $256.29, indicating a downward trend in recent quotes. WBTC (Wrapped Bitcoin) shows prices ranging from $102,487.39 to $104,516.08, demonstrating the typical high valuation of Bitcoin-based assets. The ai16z token is trading at lower values between $0.76 and $0.82.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period. From January 26-27, 2025, there were 12 new pull requests with 2 merged, 8 new issues created, and 21 active contributors. Activity increased substantially the following day (January 27-28, 2025) with 39 new pull requests, 42 merged PRs, 11 new issues, and 40 active contributors working on the project.
sources: From 2025-01-26 to 2025-01-27, elizaos/eliza had 12 new PRs (2 merged), 8 new issues, and 21 active contributors.
From 2025-01-27 to 2025-01-28, elizaos/eliza had 39 new PRs (42 merged), 11 new issues, and 40 active contributors.
